name: resource-global
description: This is the repository to host all reusable resources for SFDocs.
author: Sejal Parikh

scripts.heroku-prebuild: yarn clean && node sfdocs-repo-build-config/file-sync.js && echo "web: yarn app-start" > Procfile
scripts.heroku-postbuild: sfdocs build . && yarn decompress && yarn cache-purge
scripts.clean: yarn global add rimraf --ignore-engines && rimraf yarn.lock && rimraf dist/ && rimraf node_modules __lwr_cache__
scripts.prestart: (rimraf sfdocs-repo-build-config && (yarn check-project-req-update || echo "PreStart: Node check failed") && node sfdocs-repo-build-config/check-file.js) || echo "Failed to run pre start checks"
scripts.start: volta run --node 20.18.2 yarn app-start || yarn app-start
scripts.check-project-req-update: rimraf sfdocs-repo-build-config && git clone --depth 1 --single-branch -b main git@github.com:salesforcedocs/sfdocs-repo-build-config.git && node sfdocs-repo-build-config/installProjectReqs.js
scripts.test: volta run --node 20.18.2 yarn validate || yarn validate
scripts.file-sync-init: rimraf sfdocs-repo-build-config && git clone --depth 1 --single-branch -b main git@github.com:salesforcedocs/sfdocs-repo-build-config.git && git update-index --skip-worktree package.json && node sfdocs-repo-build-config/file-sync.js
scripts.check-file-diff: rimraf sfdocs-repo-build-config && git clone --depth 1 --single-branch -b main git@github.com:salesforcedocs/sfdocs-repo-build-config.git && node sfdocs-repo-build-config/check-file.js && rimraf sfdocs-repo-build-config
